description: ff. 322. 257 x 178; 222 x 130 mm. 27 lin. 14th cen. Commentary on the work of al-Shaybānī, d. 189/804: Brockelmann, GAL, I, 1 78 (III, commentary 3a); S I, 290 (9a). Acephalous 4th vol. (buyūʻ through siyar); the first complete chapter begins on fol. 2a: ... باب بىع المکىل ىزىد او ىنقص . قوله المبىع بشرط الکىل ىتعىن به کما مر . ش اصل الباب ان المبىع متى وقع
author: Ḥaṣīrī, Jamāl al-Dīn, 1151 or 1152-1238 or 1239
creator: Ḥaṣīrī, Jamāl al-Dīn, 1151 or 1152-1238 or 1239
subject: Shaybānī, Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥasan, ca. 750-804 or 5.—Jāmiʻ al-kabīr.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
